info.title: Salon Booking Plugin API
info.description: This is the Salon Booking Plugin API

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Resource type of services (all, primary, secondary)

get.summary: Get all available bookings dates and times
Check available primary services on date/time
get.description: Check available primary services on date/time

get.summary: Check available secondary services on date/time
get.description: Check available secondary services on date/time

services.description: Array of services ids. Empty for all services.

secondary_display_mode.description: Display secondary if: always (always), belong to the same category (category), is child of selected service (service)

secondary_parent_services.description: Parent services ids for this secondary service

address.example: 3604 Sycamore Fork Road Ft Lauderdale, FL 7146, United States

customer_address.example: 3604 Sycamore Fork Road Ft Lauderdale, FL 7146, United States

total_limit.description: Limit of usage discount (unlimited if blank).

per_user_limit.description: Limit of usage discount (unlimited if blank) per user.

services.description: Apply discount only for these services. If empty - for all services.

discount_type.description: Type of discount: coupon code or auto by logic rules

error.description: Error message if service can not be available or selected
Error message if assistant can not be available or selected

AvailibilityAssistants.description: Array of map service_id and assistant_id with available data

is_valid.description: Validation result of selected services and assistants

items.description: Days of week by these order number
